articles.title: The response to Covid-19 is critical. It's also making clinical trials harder - STAT
articles.description: When health officials succeed in stamping out outbreaks, they also make it more difficult to find the volunteers needed for clinical trials.
articles.content: In March, a team of Chinese scientists studying whether the antiviral remdesivir was effective against Covid-19 ran into a problem. Stringent public health measures used in Wuhan led to marked reductions in new patient presentations, the researchers wrote. Wi… [+9735 chars]
